intro_text: p_l suggests to r_r that it is the perfect weather to go for a swim in the ocean together.
decline_text: r_r isn't convinced, and suggests they should probably focus on the patrol instead.

success_outcomes.text: p_l flashes r_r a playful look and leaps smoothly into the water. When p_l emerges from the water, {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} slicked fur clinging to {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} muscles, r_r can't help but admire p_l for {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} strength. With the way r_r's heart is fluttering, it may not just be p_l's strength {PRONOUN/r_r/subject} {VERB/r_r/admire/admires}. {PRONOUN/r_r/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_r/brush/brushes} it aside and plunge in after {PRONOUN/p_l/object}.

Silence meets {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} question, and just as p_l is about to turn and ask again, r_r shoves {PRONOUN/p_l/object} bodily into the water. Spluttering from the cold saltwater, p_l finds it quite difficult to scowl as though {PRONOUN/p_l/subject} {VERB/p_l/mean/means} it, captivated by the sound of r_r's joyous laughter, the sunlight catching on {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} pelt in just the right way.

fail_outcomes.text: r_r dips one paw in the water and hisses, proclaiming that it's much too cold and urging p_l to come back to camp with {PRONOUN/r_r/object} instead.

s_c tries {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} best to show off {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} swimming skills, but {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} companion just isn't paying attention, too focused on {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} own swimming to notice. Eventually, s_c gives up for now, discouraged.
